name: Travelling In Space
description:
‎

‎

A short game for GBJAM 9 ‎ ‎

‎

It was fun while making this game. I figured how to make smooth movements(may have bugs) and it's my first time using GameMaker Studio 2(I often use gamemaker studio 1.4). Source code are available too!

How to play:

Dodge the asteroids. Collects powers(idk I'm out of ideas) to keep the ufo working

Controls:

Left/Right keys: Moving, Selecting(main menu)

Up key: Fly up

A: Select(main menu)

B:Go back to menu, Disable/Enable Trail(main menu)
